name: Caballeros, Dragones y Elefantes
description:
This game is an hybrid between strategy turn-based board games and card games.

There are three types of units: knights, elephants and dragons. Each of them is stronger than the others in one of their stats.

Each figure, each turn, move once and perform an action. The goal is to get rid of all your oponent's figures.

Cards are used for every kind of actions during the game: Deploy new units, upgrade the existing ones, react to the oponent moves...
